titleStmt.title: Proposals by the proprietors of East-Jersey in America for the building of a tovvn on Ambo-Point, and for the disposition of lands in that province and also for encouragement of artificers and labourers that shall transport themselves thither out of England, Scotland, and Ireland.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benjamin Clark in George-Yard in Lombard-street, bookseller,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
